str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Of unknown origin; a maiden; by implication, an unmarried daughter.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Instruction, command, order, authority. From epitasso; an injunction or decree; by implication, authoritativeness.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Opinion, counsel, judgment, intention, decree. From ginosko; cognition, i.e. opinion, or resolve.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
